WorkItem.Description:
All downloads appear to contain only some xaml files:

*     BuildProcessTemplates/DefaultTemplate.11.1.xaml

This is slightly less than useful :)

Comments.Message: If you download the link to the source directly, then yes, you get some sort of script goo. If you click on the link, it will then download the right file to you. I don't know why this happens, sorry.
